msbt.message: Hey, nice to meet you Ohmigosh! It's ! I'm so EXCITED to see you!I just moved here, and I've GOT to finish unpacking because I can't find my toothbrush Or my glitter glue. Once I'm done, let's get together and do, um, whatever, !

Ahhh! ! You're visiting ? SO happy to see you, ! I just moved to this island, and I am straight up vibrating I'm so excited to start my new life here!I'm not exaggerating. I am LEGIT vibrating. I could NOT even give you an autograph if you asked!Look at my hands! They're shaking!Listen, we're still friends even if we live on different islands, alright? Come say hey whenever!
Ohmigosh, is that you, ?! Remember me?I just moved here, so I'm totes busy making with the unpacks. But let's hang out sometime!
Huh? Who theâ€”?<10_4 /> Whoa! It's me, ! I live on this island these days! It's so fab to see you again!! Let's get together soon, 'K? I have SO much I want to tell you about what I've been doing!
